*Based on 29 of 29 reported number of supervisors ▪ Supervisors are evaluated against the workforce ▪ Written performance expectations with ▪ A training and development plan ▪ Continue to ensure new supervisors attend the ▪ All supervisors have received initial PDP training (12 hours) and annual refresher training (4 hours). ▪ Ongoing timely and honest performance feedback, including written quarterly performance reviews. ▪ Continue providing ongoing manager/supervisor training and engaging in one-on-one support with managers as needed. *Based on 29 of 29 reported number of supervisors
